name: O BUDDY, WHERE ART THOU?
description:
In this small point-and-click adventure game, the player must solve a mystery to discover who is responsible for his buddy's disappearance. 

The player will play as Inspector Colgate, an officer in the city of Monsters. 

He must investigate the crime while interacting with three monsters (Cyclocat, Lizzard, and Rabbo). 

His boss is waiting for him to take action. 

So be cautious and seek out the monster that hates humanoids the most. 

NB! The game's developers do not share the main character's viewpoint and are opposed to monster discrimination. Every monster should be given the same rights as humans! Justice for all...
